subsection.name: Introduction
subsection.p: A simple multiview map provider based on plugin-leaflet.

subsection.name: Configuration
subsection.p:
Add this module to your site:
<dependency> <groupId>fr.paris.lutece.plugins</groupId> <artifactId>module-forms-multiviewmapleaflet</artifactId> <version>[1.0.0]</version> <type>lutece-plugin</type> </dependency>
In the forms spring context configuration file, use <alias name="forms-multiviewmapleaflet.mapProvider" alias="forms.multiviewMap"/>

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: The leaflet map will show on the multiview page if this module is enabled and there is a geolocation column.
